rounds.comments: (Alex: We'll highlight a word inside our clue and those letters can be found inside the name of a country.  You, of course, have to come up with the correct country.)

clues.text: There's a lot of "love" inside this country that borders Croatia
All "hail" this country & its beautiful Buddhist temples
I could live simply in a "hut" in this Himalayan country
"Our" trip to Europe won't be complete without a visit to this small grand duchy
I could "dive" & swim all day in this island republic in the Indian Ocean

rounds.text: In Spanish & French, the word for Friday comes from Latin for "day of" this goddess
